title: Hugo Feature Test

content:
Why Hugo Hugo是由Go语言实现的静态网站生成器。简单、易用、高效、易扩展、快速部署。
Download Themes Create new page hugo new <sub/content/in/content/folder>/name.md Tips Archives Search Tags Deployment Updates git branch -M main git add . git commit -m "update" git push origin main
summary:
Why Hugo

Hugo是由Go语言实现的静态网站生成器。简单、易用、高效、易扩展、快速部署。

Download

Themes

Create new page

hugo new <sub/content/in/content/folder>/name.md

Tips

Archives

Search

Tags

Deployment

Updates

git add .
git commit -m "update"
git push origin main
